oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Fairfax, John B., 1896
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of John B. Fairfax, dated May 1st, 1894. Illustrates the full document. Fairfax leaves to his son Ephraim and his grandson John W. each a house and lot, and “the residue” of his property to his wife Louisiana Tennessee Fairfax. Fairfax’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on August 19th, 1896. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1789-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fairfax family; Tennessee family; Yarbrough family; Waddey family
